text: @UIH_InfectionPrevention @DrBleasdale"Show me the money!" Marketing Infection Prevention and Antimicrobial Stewardship to the C-suite can be a challenge. As a chief quality officer and medical director of infection prevention, I've seen firsthand how crucial it is to communicate the needs of our programs effectively. Join me at #SEA2024 where I'll share strategies on creating a business plan that highlights the value of our work and secures necessary resources. Let's work together to prioritize patient safety and prevent harmful infections! üí∞üßñ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüõë
